code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import'./TimerPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MOTIVATION_TEXTS=["LOCK radius=size/2-strokeWidth;const circumference=2*Math.PI*radius;const offset=progress/100*circumference;return _jsxs("div",{className:"timer-container",children:[_jsx("div",{className:"motivation-text",children:motivationText}),_jsxs("div",{className:"timer-circle",children:[_jsxs("svg",{className:"progress-ring",width:size,height:size,viewBox:`0 ${circumference}`,strokeDashoffset:offset}})]}),_jsxs("div",{className:"timer-display",children:[_jsxs("div",{className:"time-group",children:[renderDigit('minutes',minuteDigits[0],'tens'),renderDigit('minutes',minuteDigits[1],'ones')]}),_jsx("div",{className:"separator",children:":"}),_jsxs("div",{className:"time-group",children:[renderDigit('seconds',secondDigits[0],'tens'),renderDigit('seconds',secondDigits[1],'ones')]})]})]}),_jsx("div",{className:"controls",children:!isRunning?_jsx("button",{className:"control-button",onClick:startTimer,children:"START"}):_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[_jsx("button",{className:"control-button",onClick:stopTimer,children:"STOP"}),_jsx("button",{className:"control-button
